page.title: 12CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS 2
page.content: A list of societies in the village: Chess Club, Morris Dancers, Film Society, Music Society, Operatic and Dramatic Society, Youth Club, Wine Circle, Fishing Club, Twinning Association. {Victoria Club}has sporting facilities that are always open to members and the Dramatic Society holds its productions there. {Round Table & Ladies Circle}have meetings at the Holly Lodge hotel and the Three Greyhounds as well as each other's houses. They raise money for charities and once a year they hold a sports day. Speakers are invited to address the members. {Scouting & Guiding}are well supported. {Computer Club}uses BBCs, Commodores, Spectrums and Dragons, etc.
